item.title: Report I-2024110006
item.description:
Report I-2024110006

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-07T12:22:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-23
  • City: Sterling
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/23/2024 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL IAD Service Centre, 22720 Ladbrook Drive, Bldg 10 STE 150, Sterling, VA 20166 Transportation by road confirmed. Shipment also contains UN1950 Aerosols, flammable Class 2.1 Single Package or Inner Packaging(If any): Packaging Type: Receptacle Material of Construction: Metal Package Capacity: 198 g Amount in Package: 198 g Number in Shipment 1 Number Failed: 1

item.title: Report X-2024101855
item.description:
Report X-2024101855

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-04T12:23:29+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-23
  • City: BRISTOL
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS FLAGGED BY SECURITY FOR AN INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO INNER RETAIL PACKAGING BOXES CONTAINING DISPOSABLE VAPE CARTRIDGES WITH 5% NICOTINE WITHIN THOSE BOXES. THE VAPE CARTRIDGES ARE POWERED BY LITHIUM ION BATTERIES. THERE ARE A TOTAL OF TWENTY DISPOSABLE VAPE CARTRIDGES INSIDE THE BOX. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
